questions.question: What is the main concept behind the tourism development strategy for Timor-Leste and Nusa Tenggara Timur (NTT)?

choices: Sensitivity to local cultures and environments

questions.question: Which sustainable tourism practice is suggested in the reading?
choices: Unlimited visitor access to all sites
Implementing carrying capacity limits for sensitive sites
questions.answer: Implementing carrying capacity limits for sensitive sites

questions.question: What is mentioned as a unique feature of Timor-Leste's cultural heritage?

choices: Building a wall between the two countries

Restricting travel between the two regions
questions.answer: Joint participation in international tourism fairs

choices: Local communities, private sector operators, and government agencies
questions.answer: Local communities, private sector operators, and government agencies
